english.segment2: - Hold your breath take a step its gonna be your day they're asking you to speak the truth but you don't know what to say..feel the fear creeping up like you were on a stage you've had enough you're stepping up to say what you came to say say it just say it just say it
english.segment4: - Just say its in my heart its in my soul its something that i can't let go i come alive every time i can feel you all i am an all ill be is different since you set me free i come alive every time cause you save me lord you save me
english.segment6: - You're feeling good just like you should but now you can feel the weight of peoples eyes they pass you by hopin that you will fade so live it just live it
english.segment8: - Just say its in my heart its in my soul its something that i can't let go i come alive every time i can feel you all i am an all ill be is different since you set me free i come alive every time cause you save me lord you save me
english.segment10: - Cause this is not what we thought it would be this is why we gotta speak cuz there is love oh there is hope we gotta live it out live it out live it out so they will know
english.segment12: - Just say its in my heart its in my soul its something that i can't let go i come alive every time i can feel you all i am an all ill be is different since you set me free i come alive every time cause you save me lord you save me
english.segment14: - Hold your breath take a step its gonna be your day
